rows.label: bf06140130_0010
rows.name: So, we can make our way to Luxuria from here.

rows.label: bf06140130_0020
rows.name: I assume the Pope has a ship waiting for us.

rows.label: bf06140130_0030
rows.name: Hey, Turtle-chan.

rows.label: bf06140130_0040
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf06140130_0050
rows.name: Are we really gonna just leave Meleph behind?

rows.label: bf06140130_0060
rows.name:
Who's leaving anyone? 
She's got her own priorities, you know.

rows.label: bf06140130_0070
rows.name: Yeah, but still...

rows.label: bf06140130_0080
rows.name:
Anyway, her schedule is filled with
official duties right now.

rows.label: bf06140130_0090
rows.name:
For sure.
It's just a bit of a shame, is all.

rows.label: bf06140130_0100
rows.name:
You know, since we came all
this way together.

rows.label: bf06140130_0110
rows.name: I guess I know how you feel, chum.

rows.label: bf06140130_0120
rows.name:
Uh?
Speak of the devil...

rows.label: bf06140130_0130
rows.name: Bahn's going for the summit?

rows.label: bf06140130_0140
rows.name: On top of everything, an assassination attempt?

rows.label: bf06140130_0150
rows.name: If blood gets spilled at the summit, it'll mean war.

rows.label: bf06140130_0160
rows.name: War's good for business, after all.

rows.label: bf06140130_0170
rows.name:
I guess he wants to use that to
get himself back in with the Guild...

rows.label: bf06140130_0180
rows.name:
Why, that little... I was wondering where
he'd slunk off to! What a sneaky git...

rows.label: bf06140130_0190
rows.name: It seems Acting Chairman Nilny...

rows.label: bf06140130_0200
rows.name:
wishes to take care of this incident covertly,
to avoid it reflecting badly upon the Guild.

rows.label: bf06140130_0210
rows.name: So you came to us?

rows.label: bf06140130_0220
rows.name:
If we mobilize the army, the whole
thing will become public.

rows.label: bf06140130_0230
rows.name:
Oh, I get it.
So we're a more convenient solution.

rows.label: bf06140130_0240
rows.name: I'm not forcing you.

rows.label: bf06140130_0250
rows.name:
If you refuse, Kagutsuchi and I will
do what we can alone.

rows.label: bf06140130_0260
rows.name: Ah, come off it, lady.

rows.label: bf06140130_0270
rows.name:
You wouldn't even think of dragging us into this
if you thought you could handle it on your own.

rows.label: bf06140130_0280
rows.name: I suppose not.

rows.label: bf06140130_0290
rows.name:
You know Bahn as well as I.
There's no telling what he might be plotting.

rows.label: bf06140130_0300
rows.name: According to Acting Chairman Nilny...

rows.label: bf06140130_0310
rows.name:
several giant weapons were being built
at the factory where we last saw him.

rows.label: bf06140130_0320
rows.name: And one of them is currently unaccounted for.

rows.label: bf06140130_0330
rows.name: Giant...weapons...

rows.label: bf06140130_0340
rows.name: Got it.

rows.label: bf06140130_0350
rows.name:
Besides, you know. 
We've got our own score to settle with him.

rows.label: bf06140130_0360
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: bf06140130_0370
rows.name:
It will be easier to focus on my duties
knowing you are on the case. Good luck.

rows.label: bf06140130_0380
rows.name: Leave it to us!
